_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: The Front
author: eggs@goover.dev
description: The Front是一款生存开放世界制作射击游戏。你扮演一名被送回过去阻止暴政帝国崛起的抵抗战士。

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
clear
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}The Front  Installscript${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Egg by gOOvER | https://goover.dev${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

#apt -y update
#apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates jq dos2unix

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}download and install steamcmd. please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
echo -e "${GREEN}..done..${NC}"

## install game using steamcmd
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}install game using steamcmd. please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update 1007 +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6
echo -e "${GREEN}..done..${NC}"

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## install end
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}Installation completed...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

variables.name: [服务器] 服务器名称
variables.description: 不能包含空格和特殊符号

variables.name: [服务器] 最大玩家数
variables.description: 服务器上的最大玩家数量。

variables.name: [服务器] 配置名称
variables.description: 存档文件的名称。不能包含空格或特殊符号

variables.name: [服务器] 服务器密码
variables.description: 服务器访问密码

variables.name: [服务器] PvE模式
variables.description: 关闭 = PvP; 开启 = PvE

variables.name: [服务器] 使用Steam Socket
variables.description: 使用Steam服务器进行网络穿透。如果您没有公共IP但希望允许外部网络的玩家加入您的服务器，请启用此功能。如果禁用，只有您和局域网内的其他玩家可以加入。如果您有公共IP，则不需要启用此功能。启用此功能将影响延迟。当Steam服务器繁忙时，您可能无法加入此服务器。

variables.name: [服务器] 允许自伤？
variables.description: 允许玩家对自己造成伤害。

variables.name: [服务器] 允许队友伤害？
variables.description: 允许队友之间互相造成伤害。

variables.name: [服务器] 服务器管理员
variables.description: 输入17位Steam ID。使用分号分隔每个ID。GM级别默认为最高级别（25级）

variables.name: [高级] 显示管理员标签
variables.description: 切换特殊管理员图标。

variables.name: [高级] 服务器保存间隔
variables.description: 服务器存档间隔（以秒为单位）

variables.name: [高级] 启用新手保护？
variables.description: 启用后，新角色将获得新手保护。

variables.name: [高级] 服务器标签
variables.description:
最多5个 -> 

0= PVP |   
1= PVE | 
2= 经验倍率 |  
3= 采集率 |  
4= 保留物品栏 |  
5= 45天清档 |  
6= 15天清档 |  
7= 30天清档 |  
8= 60天清档 |

variables.name: [高级] 启用反作弊？
variables.description: 切换反作弊功能。

variables.name: [高级] 允许脏话？
variables.description: 禁用时，将屏蔽脏话。

variables.name: [服务器] 自动更新
variables.description: 在启动/重启时自动更新服务器

variables.name: [服务器] 信标端口
variables.description: 端口+1

variables.name: [服务器] 查询端口
variables.description: 端口+2

variables.name: [服务器] 关闭服务端口
variables.description: 端口+3

variables.name: WINDOWS_INSTALL
variables.description: 请勿删除！！！
